Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Classes and interfaces that make up the combinatorial representation of the game of Sprouts.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorTag
    A tag for objects that have a color.
    CompoundEdge
    A CompoundEdge is an edge in LocalRotations.
    DirectedEdge
    A DirectedEdge of a graph is a directed connection between 2 of its vertices.
    Graph
    A Graph is a combinatorial representation of a game of Sprouts.
    GraphTransformation
    This interface represents any type of Graph transformation, such as adding a Submove to a Graph.
    LocalRotations
    Represents a graph Vertex - v and a set of DirectedEdges (a, b).
    Vertex
    A Graph vertex.
    VertexSearch
    Objects that implement this interface represent operations that search for a certain Vertex.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CachedCompoundEdge
    A decorator for CompoundEdge that caches original.
    ClockwiseComparator
    Comparator that orders DirectedEdges in clock-wise order given a center Vertex.
    CompoundEdge.Wrapped
    A simple origin and direction CompoundEdge wrapper.
    CompoundPolyline
    A CompoundEdge Polyline is a Polyline that prepends CompoundEdge.origin() to CompoundEdge.direction().
    FaceIntersectionSearch
    Objects of this class can find the intersection between a line segment and a Graph face.
    GraphCreation
    Creates a new Graph by connecting numOfSprouts with a cobweb in a circle around the center of the gameBounds.
    IsMovePossible
    A check that tests whether a Move is possible in gameState.
    IsSubmovePossibleInFace
    A check that tests whether a Move is possible in the face of the gameState.
    MoveTransformation
    A MoveTransformation is a GraphTransformation that creates and returns a new state after applying the move to the currentState.
    NearestSproutSearch
    A NearestSproutSearch object can find the nearest sprout in Graph to a specified Vector2 position.
    NextCompoundEdge
    Represents the first CompoundEdge v, (c, d) after current - v, (a, b) in rotationsList.
    PolylineEdge
    This class represents a Polyline-backed DirectedEdge.
    PolylineIntersectionSearch
    Objects of this class can find the intersection between a line segment and a Polyline.
    PresetGraph
    A reference Graph implementation.
    PresetRotations
    A reference LocalRotations implementation.
    PresetVertex
    Read-only, struct-like Vertex implementation.
    ReversedCompoundEdge
    A CompoundEdge decorator that is the reversal of original.
    StraightLineEdge
    Represents a straight line directed Graph edge between from() and to().
    SubmoveTransformation
    A SubmoveTransformation is a GraphTransformation that creates and returns a new state after applying the submove to the currentState.
    TransformedGraph
    This object is a cache for the result of GraphTransformation.transformed().
    VoidVertex
    This class represents a non-existent Vertex.

Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb Description

Classes and interfaces that make up the combinatorial representation of the game of Sprouts.
